price: 60. (Xusuuso, Nabiyow) markaan kugu nidhi: Rabbigaa wuxuu koobaa dadka;  kamana aynu yeelin riyadaan ku tusnay19 waxaan ahayn imtixaamid dadka, iyo geedka baasba (ee ku xusan) Qur’aanka (waa Zaquumka), oo aan ku bajinno, umase kordhiyo waxaan ahayn xadgudub weyn.
arabic: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لَكَ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ أَحَاطَ بِٱلنَّاسِۚ وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا ٱلرُّءۡيَا ٱلَّتِيٓ أَرَيۡنَٰكَ إِلَّا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلنَّاسِ وَٱلشَّجَرَةَ ٱلۡمَلۡعُونَةَ فِي ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِۚ وَنُخَوِّفُهُمۡ فَمَا يَزِيدُهُمۡ إِلَّا طُغۡيَٰنٗا كَبِيرٗا
footnotes: 19. Riyada la tusay waxaa loola jeedaa riyadii la tusay ee ku saabsanayd dagaalkii Badar inta uusan dagaalku billaaban. Mufasiriinta qaarkoodna waxay yidhaahdeen riyadii la tusay habeenkii Micraajka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qul'nā laka inna rabbaka aḥāṭa bil-nāsi wamā jaʿalnā al-ru'yā allatī araynāka illā fit'natan lilnnāsi wal-shajarata al-malʿūnata fī al-qur'āni wanukhawwifuhum famā yazīduhum illā ṭugh'yānan kabīran
